languages.text: "Обычно между нами пропасть разногласий, господин дознаватель. Но сейчас я готова переступить через нее — и вместе с вами надрать его пестрый зад". {n}Джай ухмыляется не менее мрачно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Ничего примечательного, господин дознаватель. Крашенные под золото побрякушки, самодовольные ухмылки — и бесконечная болтовня о том, как могущественен этот властелин гальюна".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "More often than not, there is a ravine of differences lying between us, Master Interrogator. But right now, I am prepared to cross it, so that we may stand together and give this one's motley posterior the beating it deserves." {n}Jae's crooked smile is as grim as Heinrix's.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Обычно между нами пропасть разногласий, господин дознаватель. Но сейчас я готова переступить через нее — и вместе с вами надрать его пестрый зад". {n}Джай ухмыляется не менее мрачно.{/n}

languages.text: "Zwischen uns besteht häufig eine Kluft der Uneinigkeit, Meister Interrogator. Doch nun bin ich bereit, sie zu überqueren, damit wir Seite an Seite stehen und dieser Person wohl verdient den Hintern versohlen können." {n}Jae grinst ebenso grimmig wie Heinrix.{/n}
languages.original_text: "More often than not, there is a ravine of differences lying between us, Master Interrogator. But right now, I am prepared to cross it, so that we may stand together and give this one's motley posterior the beating it deserves." {n}Jae's crooked smile is as grim as Heinrix's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Zwischen uns besteht häufig eine Kluft der Uneinigkeit, Meister Interrogator. Doch nun bin ich bereit, sie zu überqueren, damit wir Seite an Seite stehen und dieser Person wohl verdient den Hintern versohlen können." {n}Jae grinst ebenso grimmig wie Heinrix.{n}

languages.text: « Bien souvent, une véritable montagne de différences nous sépare, maître interrogateur. Mais je suis prête à la franchir afin de vous prêter main-forte pour botter ce séant bariolé comme il le mérite. » {n}Le sourire en coin de Jae est aussi sombre que celui d'Heinrix.{/n}
languages.original_text: "More often than not, there is a ravine of differences lying between us, Master Interrogator. But right now, I am prepared to cross it, so that we may stand together and give this one's motley posterior the beating it deserves." {n}Jae's crooked smile is as grim as Heinrix's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Bien souvent, une véritable montagne de différences nous sépare, maître interrogateur. Mais je suis prête à la franchir afin de vous prêter main-forte pour botter ce séant bariolé comme il le mérite. » {n}Le sourire en coin de Jae est aussi sombre que celui d'Heinrix.{n}

languages.text: “通常情况下，咱们两个之间始终存在着巨大的分歧，审讯官大师。但现在，我打算暂且搁置这些分歧，这样咱们就可以一起收拾这个花里胡哨的家伙了。我看他的屁股是欠顿毒打了。”{n}婕伊露出了恶毒的微笑，与海因里希的笑容同样阴沉。{/n}
languages.original_text: "More often than not, there is a ravine of differences lying between us, Master Interrogator. But right now, I am prepared to cross it, so that we may stand together and give this one's motley posterior the beating it deserves." {n}Jae's crooked smile is as grim as Heinrix's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “通常情况下，咱们两个之间始终存在着巨大的分歧，审讯官大师。但现在，我打算暂且搁置这些分歧，这样咱们就可以一起收拾这个花里胡哨的家伙了。我看他的屁股是欠顿毒打了。”{n}婕伊露出了恶毒的微笑，与海因里希的笑容同样阴沉。{n}

languages.text: «Suele diferenciarnos todo un abismo, maestro interrogador, pero, ahora mismo, estoy dispuesta a cruzarlo para darle juntos la paliza que se merece a este miserable multicolor». {n}La sonrisa torcida de Jae es tan siniestra como la de Heinrix.{/n}
languages.original_text: "More often than not, there is a ravine of differences lying between us, Master Interrogator. But right now, I am prepared to cross it, so that we may stand together and give this one's motley posterior the beating it deserves." {n}Jae's crooked smile is as grim as Heinrix's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Suele diferenciarnos todo un abismo, maestro interrogador, pero, ahora mismo, estoy dispuesta a cruzarlo para darle juntos la paliza que se merece a este miserable multicolor». {n}La sonrisa torcida de Jae es tan siniestra como la de Heinrix.{n}

languages.text: 「異端審問官さん、アタシたちの間には多くの場合、深い溝があるものよね。でも今は、その溝を越えて力を合わせて、この道化まがいのやつの尻に相応しい制裁を与えるつもりよ」{n}ジェイの歪んだ笑みは、ハインリックスのそれと同じく冷酷だった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "More often than not, there is a ravine of differences lying between us, Master Interrogator. But right now, I am prepared to cross it, so that we may stand together and give this one's motley posterior the beating it deserves." {n}Jae's crooked smile is as grim as Heinrix's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「異端審問官さん、アタシたちの間には多くの場合、深い溝があるものよね。でも今は、その溝を越えて力を合わせて、この道化まがいのやつの尻に相応しい制裁を与えるつもりよ」{n}ジェイの歪んだ笑みは、ハインリックスのそれと同じく冷酷だった。{n}

languages.text: "Çoğu zaman aramızda bir farklılıklar uçurumu var Üstat Sorgucu. Fakat şu anda bu uçurumu geçmeye hazırım. Böylece bir araya gelip bu hergeleye hak ettiği dayağı atabiliriz." {n}Jae'ın çarpık gülümsemesi, Heinrix'inki kadar kasvetli duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "More often than not, there is a ravine of differences lying between us, Master Interrogator. But right now, I am prepared to cross it, so that we may stand together and give this one's motley posterior the beating it deserves." {n}Jae's crooked smile is as grim as Heinrix's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Çoğu zaman aramızda bir farklılıklar uçurumu var, Üstat Sorgucu. Fakat şu anda, bu uçurumu geçmeye hazırım. Böylece bir araya gelip bu hergeleye hak ettiği dayağı atabiliriz." {n}Jae'nin çarpık gülümsemesi, Heinrix'inki kadar kasvetli.{n}
